title: season rewards
body: hey guys, i wanted to know if i am qualified for season rewards. i did dc a few times this season, one of them including yesterday. i had no recent punishments but a couple months back i got a low priority q for a series of dc's. obviously my net is not the best, but i just wanted to know whether or not to expect the rewards. im only silver so i dont really get too much. but its my first ranked season and i was really hoping to cash out on these.
